com.pcloud.sdk

Class DataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pcloud.sdk.DataSource

  • public abstract class DataSource
extends java.lang.Object
    A source of data.

    An abstraction over the byte stream writing operations, this class allows for a flexible way to write bytes to a BufferedSink.

    Generally used for specifying a data source when creating/uploading files.

    • The create(File) method can be used for reading data from a local file.
    • The create(byte[]) method can be used for reading data from a byte array.
    • The create(ByteString) method can be used for reading data from Okio's immutable byte arrays.
    • For any other cases just extend the class and do your magic in the writeTo(BufferedSink) method.

      • contentLength

        public long contentLength()
        Returns:
        the data source length.

        Override this method to provide the size of the data to be written, if known in advance, otherwise return -1.
